A sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons at their late monethly fast, being on Wednesday, June 30. 1647. / By Nathaniel Ward Minister of Gods Word. Ward, Nathaniel, 1578-1652.
[8], 27, [1] p.
Printed by R.I. for Stephen Bowtell at the signe of the Bible in Popes-head Alley, London, : 1647.
The first leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
